title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2805/95 of 5 December 1995 fixing the export refunds in the wine sector and repealing Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No  2805/95 of 5 December 1995 fixing the export refunds in the wine sector and repealing Regulation  (EEC) No 2137/93
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
1.  The export refunds provided for in Article 55 of Regulation (EEC)  No 822/87 are fixed in the Annex hereto.
2.  Regulation (EEC) No 2137/93 is hereby repealed.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 5 December 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
